name: MyBrickBreaker X
description:
Welcome to

MyBrickBreaker X, the classic brick-breaker game with a touch of modernity! In this game, you'll experience the challenge of destroying blocks and collecting points as you make your way through six exciting levels.

With simple particle effects, each level becomes a unique experience. From shimmering star showers to colorful explosions that turn the blocks into dust, each level will surprise you in a new way.

If you need a break to gather yourself or plan your next move, you can use the simple pause menu, which only consists of "continue" and "exit" options, to pause the game and explore your options.

Features:

  • Six exciting levels
  • Simple particle effects
  • Easy-to-use pause menu with "continue" and "exit" options
  • Classic brick-breaker gameplay with a modern twist

Controls:

  • Use the "A" and "D" keys to move the paddle left and right
  • Press the "Space" key to launch the ball
  • Press "Esc" to pause the game and access the pause menu
  • In the pause menu, use the "W" and "S" keys to navigate through the options and press "Space" to select your choice
  • Press "Enter" to continue after pausing the game

Get ready to experience the thrill of MyBrickBreaker X and become a master of destruction
